ModMetaData.name: Gestalt Engine Scenario (ALPHA!!!)
ModMetaData.author: CTH2004, Breadmond
ModMetaData.description:
A mod to add in a scenario to the Gestalt Engine mod by Helixien. Now, at first, it started as what was supposed to be an "easy" mod. Now, well... there's a reason it's an Alpha!
So, anyways, due to how much of a project this mod is, I couldn't have done it without help, so,
Firstly, thank you Breadmond, for the idea, and pestering me when I forgot (: If it wasn't for you, this mod would never have been completed! (Also for testing it, and making a proto-type non-mod version) Without the idea, this wouldn't exist. Without the prototype, I would have had no idea where to even begin. Without the pestering, I would have stopped half way through
Next up, thank you to Nirahiel, without whom I couldn't have even begun to do the necessary C# code, nor realize that this mod would reqrire code! He described a good algorithim for the system, and the holography is based on his idea!
Finally, thank you Helixien for making the Gestalt Engine mod, without which this mod wouldn't be possible!
~~~Frequently asked questions. The bellow ones are used in almost all the mods, so they are included FAQ Q: CE Compatible? A: Uh... sure. There might be "unintented features" that we can't guarentee to fix, but you do you and all! Do note, I have heard that Gestalt Engine (the main reqrirment) is compatible.
Progress: Holography: 0% Gestalt Engine Avatar: 0% Subcore Production: 8% Research: 39% Scenarios: 3%
